H0.text: Which British band released their debut album ‘Definitely Maybe’ in 1994. Blur

H3.text: Which British band released their debut album ‘Definitely Maybe’ in 1994. Oasis

A4.text: Oasis released their debut studio album Definitely Maybe in 1994.

A5.text: Oasis were spotted by Creation Records co‑owner Alan McGee after a Live Demonstration tape in May 1993.
